rows.label: tlk41100122_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you're the ones who helped
out my older brother! Hey, guess what?
He sent us a present!

rows.label: tlk41100122_03_msg0002
rows.name:
There was a letter with it too.
You and older brother solved the mystery
together, right?

rows.label: tlk41100122_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm so proud of him. He's like some
kind of genius detective!
